profileAlternative.name: Katherine Zhao
profileAlternative.headline: AI/Machine Learning Engineer at Google Cloud
profileAlternative.summary:
Welcome to my LinkedIn page.

Data is everywhere and is changing the world. I am interested in harnessing the power of big data and using various algorithms to answer interesting questions and drive business decisions.

The areas of my expertise are in Machine Learning (ML), Natural Language Processing (NLP), Deep Learning, Statistical Analysis, and Data Mining.

My professional skills include not limit to:
• Develop Data-Driven products using ML and Deep Learning algorithms.
• Provide Big Data Analytics solutions for business use cases on Spark and Hadoop.
• Proficient in NLP, Statistical Analysis and Data Mining in Python and R.
• Advanced analytics and modeling skills in Python, R, and SAS.
• Work with cloud computing platforms: Microsoft Azure and Amazon Web Services.
• Proficient in Microsoft SQL Server, Cosmos DB, Apache Hive, Pivotal Greenplum Database, HAWQ, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB platforms, SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS), and Microsoft Excel.
• Data visualization with PowerBI, Tableau, matlibplot in Python, ggplot2 and Shiny App in R.
• Great knowledge about Data Architecture and Data Engineering/ETL Process.
• Hands on with Linux command line.

positions.title: Advisory Board Member
positions.description: The Data Institute is creating a new partnership between industry and academia. It educates and develops highly talented data scientists by providing experiential learning opportunities and supporting the research of data science and deep learning. It brings together researchers, students, industry leaders and nonprofits to apply data-driven solutions to social issues.

given.text: Shilpi was my recruiter while I was interviewing at Google. I would like to share my strong recommendation for her as she has made the process so smooth and enjoyable. Shilpi was an excellent recruiter. She standed from my perspective and helped present my profile on my behalf. We had time zone difference, but she stayed late and updated me on any progress. She also gave me a clear picture of the next steps that I should expect and guide me through them. Lastly, she has excellent communication skills and talked me through every details over the phone. That said, I would certainly recommend Shilpi for any organization looking to hire technical engineers/scientists. See less

It is rare that you come across a manager like Vikram Lakshmipathy. Vikram has been very supportive the entire time when I worked with him at GE Digital and has always been the “go to person” whenever I looked for guidance in my career. He not only supported the growth of my technical skills, but also helped with my long term career development.
As a manager, beyond just giving projects to his employee, Vikram helped me understand the bigger pictures of them from a higher angle too so that I understand how my work would impact on the business. This truly made me think more from different perspectives to develop better products for the company.
I highly recommend Vikram as a manager as I know that he will never let anyone down.
See less
